member.name: T:VRC.SDKBase.Editor.BuildPipeline.VRCSDKRequestedBuildType
member.summary: The type of build requested by the user.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.Editor.BuildPipeline.VRCSDKRequestedBuildType.Avatar
member.summary: The user requested an avatar build.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.Editor.BuildPipeline.VRCSDKRequestedBuildType.Scene

member.name: T:VRC.SDKBase.Editor.BuildPipeline.IVRCSDKBuildRequestedCallback
member.summary: This interface allows you to perform some logic before the VRChat SDK starts building the content.
member.remarks: Returning false from the OnBuildRequested method will abort the build process.
